thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Down to the Wire
Congress this morning approved a breakthrough two-year budget deal and stopgap spending bill. Passage of the sweeping spending package effectively ends one of the most high-stakes fights in Washington. In the House, the bill narrowly passed, overcoming opposition from conservative Republicans opposed to boosting federal spending and Democrats worried its passage would diminish their leverage in the coming debate over immigration. The Senate hours earlier approved the measure, 71 to 28, though...
